name: UltimateCoinFlip
0:
”Alexa open Ultimate Coin Flip.”
”Alexa launch Ultimate Coin Flip.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ultimate coin flip
des:
This skill has Alexa flip a coin as many times as you want and tell you the results. Seriously, you can even ask for one million flips. Whatever the amount, Alexa will flip the coin and tell you the results.

The minimum number of flips is zero. The maximum number is 999,999,999,999,999 flips. (Although you can also try infinity.)

To launch, simply say, "Alexa open ultimate coin flip."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
